title: How to find a client as a SEO freelancer - Quora

response.answer_text: A lot of reasons exist why a freelancer can’t find a job. Some reasons connect to seasonality and your bid strategy. Here’s a handy dandy checklist: Make an Upwork profileSign up for Periodix AI job searchMake similar profiles on every alternate competitor’s siteBookmark find-work forums like /r/forhire and check them every 30 minutesAccording to the article it helps to find a project faster. There are different ways for searching projects.

Hello Sir Don’t go with freelancer there is many fake companies give us work and after we done with given work they will not give our charges sometime. And if they give, that amount is very less. So freelancer is waste of time for our SEO department. If you want to try then you can signup and check. But i will advise increase your local contact and ask them for work. If you have any query ask me freely.
